Name: A Magical High School Girl / 魔法の女子高生
About the game: 'The magic beckons you.' A Magical High School Girl is a magic crafting rogue-like RPG! The only weapon you possess is the magic you conjure from within. You can freely name your magic. The elemental properties and effects are generated automatically with what you typed in. Develop the magics you obtain, gain magics from magic stones within the dungeon, and combine to develop even stronger magics. A high school girl lost in a magical world against a variety of unique monsters with a mysterious coven of witches. Her survival in this cruel yet alluring world all depend on your crafting skills!
